arStrings.szText: After killing an enemy with {c_important}Shred{/c}, you gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Spirit. Your {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skills deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%x|]{/c} increased damage when cast above {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} Spirit.

Killing an enemy with {c_important}Shred{/c} gives {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Spirit. Your {c_important}Werewolf{/c} Skills deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%x|]{/c} increased damage when cast above {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} Spirit.
